subject: Replacing elastomers with springs
description_text:
Hello,

I am about to buy simsonn plus x pedals with baseplate from your site and I
wonder, if I can replace elastomers with springs that are available in your
store or those are only for replacing the original preload spring?

Beat regards,
Bart

conversations.body_text: Hi Bartosz,  The springs can be used to replace the elastomers.Â
